file.name: openApi.yml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.3 info: title: Twitter Process API version: '1.0' description: |2+ Created at 13/04/2022, 13:42 Generated Open API: - **openApi.yml**: Documentation of the Processes (this DocumentationðŸ˜Š). - **postmanOpenApi.yml**: Open Api that you can import to Postman! Be aware that this needs some adjustments. >WARNING: This is an experimental way and not approved. **** The self-contained process solution contains * The process model as BPMN (auto-deployed during startup) * Glue code for the service task * REST endpoint that then starts a process instance * Test case Requirements: * Java >= 8 * Maven ## How to run * Download/clone the code in this folder. * You need to set your Camunda cloud client connection details in the file `application.properties`. Simply replace the existing sample values. * Run the application: ``` mvn package exec:java ``` ``` curl -i -X PUT http://localhost:8323/tweet \ -H 'cache-control: no-cache' \ -H 'content-type: application/json' \ -d '{ "tweet":"What the f***!", "author":"Sergey", "boss":"Putin" }' ``` * You should see something like this: paths: /Process/TwitterDemoProcess: head: tags: - TwitterDemoProcess summary: 'Process: TwitterDemoProcess' description: "This runs the Twitter Approvement Process.\n
\nUsed\ \ in the 0 Process(es)\n

\n\n\n- \n\n\n

\n
\n" operationId: 'Process: TwitterDemoProcess' requestBody: content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/Tweet' examples: standard: value: tweet: Hello Tweet author: pme123 boss: Great Master required: true responses: '200': description: '' content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/ReviewedTweet' examples: standard: value: tweet: Hello Tweet author: pme123 boss: Great Master approved: false /UserTask/user_task_review_tweet: head: tags: - TwitterDemoProcess summary: 'UserTask: user_task_review_tweet' description: '' operationId: 'UserTask: user_task_review_tweet' requestBody: content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/Tweet' examples: standard: value: tweet: Hello Tweet author: pme123 boss: Great Master required: true responses: '200': description: '' content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/ReviewedTweet' examples: standard: value: tweet: Hello Tweet author: pme123 boss: Great Master approved: false Tweet accepted: value: tweet: Hello Tweet author: pme123 boss: Great Master approved: false Tweet rejected: value: tweet: Hello Tweet author: pme123 boss: Great Master approved: false components: schemas: ReviewedTweet: required: - tweet - author - boss - approved type: object properties: tweet: type: string author: type: string boss: type: string approved: type: boolean description: Every Tweet has to be accepted by the Boss. Tweet: required: - tweet - author - boss type: object properties: tweet: type: string author: type: string boss: type: string description: Every employee may create a Tweet.
